{{Description|Pure elemental life-forms composed of drifting [[Anemo]] particles, as free and unbound as the butterflies they resemble.<br />A glittering Anemo creature that is the product of rising and condensing elements, and which feeds off the ubiquitous power of Anemo.<br />They say that the flapping of a butterfly's wings has the power to whip up a storm.|[[Archive]] Description}}
'''Anemo Crystalfly''' is a species of Crystalfly which can be located throughout [[Mondstadt]]. It can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor creatures, as the name implies, can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

==Drops==
{{Card|Crystal Core|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=281 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
